question: Khadi wrist watches have been recently launched by the Khadi and Village Industries Commission, in association with which company?
explanation:
The Union minister Nitin Gadkari recently launched the unique Khadi wrist watches, which have been manufactured as part of a joint initiative by the Khadi and Village Industries Commission and leading Indian consumer goods firm, Titan. The watches have been launched on the death anniversary of Mahatma Gandhi, also features the iconic charka.
The Minister also suggested to showcase the watches in international airports to attract buyers. As per the announcement from KVIC, 1 square meter of Khadi fabric is used for manufacturing 10 watches and 1,000 such watches are proposed to be sold.
